term.title: alcoholates

item.text: Synonymous with alkoxides. Alcoholate should not be used for solvates derived from an alcohol such as CaCl2.nROH, for the ending -ate often occurs in names for anions.

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1307. 'Glossary of class names of organic compounds and reactivity intermediates based on structure (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1312 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567081307)

term.citation: Citation: 'alcoholates' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.A00203

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
